text.data-name: Fleck Publisher is an ebook ghostwriting and publishing company helping new and established authors, agencies and businesses launch their book ideas and manuscripts into compelling bestsellers. We plan outlines and coach authors, edit and proofread drafts,
text.tspan: Fleck Publisher is an ebook ghostwriting and publishing company helping new
and established authors, agencies and businesses launch their book ideas and
manuscripts into compelling bestsellers. We plan outlines and coach authors,
edit and proofread drafts, design covers, format and publish for print and digital,
register ISBNs, create promotion plansâ€” and teleport your book to readers.
